dt: {bc}a hen of the domestic chicken less than a year old

et: Middle English {it}polet{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}pullet{/it} young bird, chicken, diminutive of {it}pulle, poule{/it} young animal, from Late Latin {it}pullus{/it}, from Latin, young animal, chicken, sprout {ma}{mat|foal|}{/ma}
shortdef: a young hen; specifically : a hen of the domestic chicken less than a year old
